name: Summon Genie, Lesser
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: People of the Sands © 2013, Paizo Publishing, LLC
components: V, S, F/DF (an oil lamp worth at least 50 gp)
range: close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels) effect one summoned genie
text: This spell functions like summon monster I, except you can summon one janni.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，器材/法器（一份至少价值50GP的灯油）
text_zh: 这个法术类似召唤怪物 I(summon monster I) ，除了你可以召唤1个小巨灵（janni）
